msg.msgText:
The current "LogAutoTransfer" statistics can be obtained using the "imaserver stat LogAutoTransfer" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver stat LogAutoTransfer help imaserver stat LogAutoTransfer
EXAMPLE: imaserver stat LogAutoTransfer
NOTES: 1. Values for successful and failed transfers are reset when the LogAutoTransfer configuration changes.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
